Package com.yn_1.novello_app.library

Interface LibraryContract.Model

All Known Implementing Classes:
LibraryModel
Enclosing interface:
LibraryContract
public static interface LibraryContract.Model
Library Model
For storing data and communicating with database.

  • Method Details

    • fetchAllBooks

      void fetchAllBooks(User user, LibraryContract.View view, LibraryContract.Presenter presenter)
      Fetches all books in the user library from the database.
      Parameters:
      user - Representation of user to obtain library information from.
      view - The view of the library screen.
      presenter - The presenter of the library screen.

    • assignImageToBook

      void assignImageToBook(Book book, String imageURL, android.widget.ImageButton button, LibraryContract.View presenter)
      Fetches the cover image of the book from the database, and assigns it to the book.
      Parameters:
      book - Representation of book to be processed.
      imageURL - String representing the URL to fetch an image from
      button - ImageButton representing the button to assign the fetched image to.
      presenter - The presenter of the library screen.

    • getUserBookCollection

      List<Book> getUserBookCollection()
      Returns the user book collection.
      Returns:
      List representing the user's book collection

    • addBookButton

      void addBookButton(Book book, android.widget.ImageButton button)
      Add image buttons to collection.
      Parameters:
      book - Representation of book to be added to collection
      button - ImageButton representing the image button to be added.

    • getBookButton

      Book getBookButton(android.widget.ImageButton button)
      Gets the book from the book's image button representation.
      Parameters:
      button - ImageButton representing the book to be obtained.
